title: Question 3:
description: How much gas fee will I save from using Zaps?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: Besides allowing you to “zap” into defi protocols without going into their respective website, Zap also allows you to save on transaction fees. For a concrete example, see the below picture previously tweeted by one of our co-founders, Nodar. Or better yet, try it out yourself [here](zapper.fi/invest)
